name: Minecraft Java Server
long_description: This template deploys a Minecraft: Java Edition server.
cmds: docker run -d --name ${name} ${extra_params} -p ${portmap_25565}:25565 -v ${name}-data:/data -w /data alpine:latest sh -c "apk add --no-cache openjdk21-jre tmux curl unzip ncurses && curl -L -o server.jar ${server_jar} && echo 'eula=true' > eula.txt && tmux new -d -s minecraft 'while true; do java -jar server.jar nogui; sleep 1; done' && tail -f /dev/null"
